data.description:
SURVIVAL SHOT is dynamic VR shooter where your main goal is to survive alone during Zombie apocalypse in town. There are multiple kinds of weapons to help you break through weaves of undead. Would you be able to killed horror zombies when you are encircled by crowds of Zombies? Find your way out by killing terrifying zombies on your way with fully immersive VR experience.

TOWN SURVIVAL:-
Survival Shot is VR action game designed to put you Face to Face with all Zombie challenges. So compete waves survival, Buy guns, grenade to fight with boss zombies while collecting props like stones, tires, spare and knives to kill deadly zombies.

BRIDGE SURVIVOR:-
Are you ready to tackle all zombies that will appear on Bridge. This mode will be so challenging because you are stuck on bridge while Zombies are trying to attack you and you have to kill with best weapons. Collect as much points to unlock guns and skins for more fun.

ZOMBIE RUN:-
Zombie run is a VR Runner mode that will be more interesting for you because the primary concern is to get best weapons and kill the enemies that come your way, the challenge here is that most zombies tend to be very challenging to deal with, and their level of power does increase as you run further, so eliminate or dodge Zombies to survive.
